title: Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: Silicon stops heat in its tracks
Hybrid superconductor–quantum dot devices
title_cn: 混合超导体-量子点器件
abstract: Advances in nanofabrication techniques have made it possible to make devices in which superconducting electrodes are connected to non-superconducting nanostructures such as quantum dots. The properties of these hybrid devices result from a combination of a macroscopic quantum phenomenon involving large numbers of electrons (superconductivity) and the ability to control single electrons, offered by quantum dots. Here we review research into electron transport and other fundamental processes that have been studied in these devices. We also describe potential applications, such as a transistor in which the direction of a supercurrent can be reversed by adding just one electron to a quantum dot.
abstract_cn: 纳米制造技术的进步使得制造超导电极连接到非超导纳米结构（例如量子点）的装置成为可能。 这些混合器件的特性来自涉及大量电子（超导性）的宏观量子现象和由量子点提供的控制单个电子的能力的结合。 在这里，我们回顾对这些器件中已研究的电子传输和其他基本过程的研究。 我们还描述了潜在的应用，例如晶体管，通过向量子点仅添加一个电子就可以反转超电流的方向。</ p>

title: Folding and cutting DNA into reconfigurable topological nanostructures
title_cn: 将DNA折叠并切割成可重构的拓扑纳米结构
abstract: Topology is the mathematical study of the spatial properties that are preserved through the deformation, twisting and stretching of objects. Topological architectures are common in nature and can be seen, for example, in DNA molecules that condense and relax during cellular events. Synthetic topological nanostructures, such as catenanes and rotaxanes, have been engineered using supramolecular chemistry, but the fabrication of complex and reconfigurable structures remains challenging. Here, we show that DNA origami can be used to assemble a Möbius strip, a topological ribbon-like structure that has only one side. In addition, we show that the DNA Möbius strip can be reconfigured through strand displacement to create topological objects such as supercoiled ring and catenane structures. This DNA fold-and-cut strategy, analogous to Japanese kirigami, may be used to create and reconfigure programmable topological structures that are unprecedented in molecular engineering.
abstract_cn: 拓扑是通过对象的变形，扭曲和拉伸保留的空间特性的数学研究。 拓扑结构在自然界中很常见，例如可以在细胞事件期间凝聚和松弛的DNA分子中看到。 合成的拓扑纳米结构，例如链烷和轮烷，已经使用超分子化学方法进行了工程设计，但是制造复杂且可重构的结构仍然具有挑战性。 在这里，我们显示了DNA折纸可用于组装M＆bius带，这是仅一侧的拓扑带状结构。 此外，我们表明可以通过链置换来重新配置DNA M＆＃246; bius条带，以创建拓扑对象，例如超螺旋环和连环结构。 这种类似于日本kirigami的DNA折叠和切割策略，可用于创建和重新配置在分子工程中前所未有的可编程拓扑结构。

title: Reduction of thermal conductivity in phononic nanomesh structures
title_cn: 降低声子纳米网结构的热导率
abstract: Controlling the thermal conductivity of a material independently of its electrical conductivity continues to be a goal for researchers working on thermoelectric materials for use in energy applications and in the cooling of integrated circuits. In principle, the thermal conductivity κ and the electrical conductivity σ may be independently optimized in semiconducting nanostructures because different length scales are associated with phonons (which carry heat) and electric charges (which carry current). Phonons are scattered at surfaces and interfaces, so κ generally decreases as the surface-to-volume ratio increases. In contrast, σ is less sensitive to a decrease in nanostructure size, although at sufficiently small sizes it will degrade through the scattering of charge carriers at interfaces. Here, we demonstrate an approach to independently controlling κ based on altering the phonon band structure of a semiconductor thin film through the formation of a phononic nanomesh film. These films are patterned with periodic spacings that are comparable to, or shorter than, the phonon mean free path. The nanomesh structure exhibits a substantially lower thermal conductivity than an equivalently prepared array of silicon nanowires, even though this array has a significantly higher surface-to-volume ratio. Bulk-like electrical conductivity is preserved. We suggest that this development is a step towards a coherent mechanism for lowering thermal conductivity.
abstract_cn: 控制材料的热导率而不依赖于其电导率仍然是研究热电材料以用于能源应用和集成电路冷却的研究人员的目标。原则上，导热系数＆＃954;和电导率＆＃963;由于不同的长度尺度与声子（携带热量）和电荷（携带电流）相关联，因此可以在半导体纳米结构中独立优化。声子散布在表面和界面上，因此＆＃954;通常随着表面体积比的增加而降低。相反，＆＃963;对纳米结构尺寸的减小不太敏感，尽管在足够小的尺寸下它将通过界面处电荷载流子的散射而降解。在这里，我们演示了一种独立控制＆＃954;的方法。基于通过形成声子纳米网膜来改变半导体薄膜的声子带结构。这些膜以与声子平均自由程相当或比声子平均自由程短的周期性间隔进行构图。纳米网状结构显示出比等效制备的硅纳米线阵列低得多的热导率，即使该阵列具有明显更高的表面体积比。保持大块状的导电性。我们认为，这一进展是朝着降低热导率的相干机制迈出的一步。

title: Boron nitride substrates for high-quality graphene electronics
title_cn: 用于高质量石墨烯电子产品的氮化硼衬底
abstract: Graphene devices on standard SiO2 substrates are highly disordered, exhibiting characteristics that are far inferior to the expected intrinsic properties of graphene. Although suspending the graphene above the substrate leads to a substantial improvement in device quality, this geometry imposes severe limitations on device architecture and functionality. There is a growing need, therefore, to identify dielectrics that allow a substrate-supported geometry while retaining the quality achieved with a suspended sample. Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN) is an appealing substrate, because it has an atomically smooth surface that is relatively free of dangling bonds and charge traps. It also has a lattice constant similar to that of graphite, and has large optical phonon modes and a large electrical bandgap. Here we report the fabrication and characterization of high-quality exfoliated mono- and bilayer graphene devices on single-crystal h-BN substrates, by using a mechanical transfer process. Graphene devices on h-BN substrates have mobilities and carrier inhomogeneities that are almost an order of magnitude better than devices on SiO2. These devices also show reduced roughness, intrinsic doping and chemical reactivity. The ability to assemble crystalline layered materials in a controlled way permits the fabrication of graphene devices on other promising dielectrics and allows for the realization of more complex graphene heterostructures.
abstract_cn:
标准SiO 2 衬底上的

石墨烯器件高度无序，其特征远低于预期的石墨烯固有特性。尽管将石墨烯悬浮在基板上方会导致设备质量的显着改善，但这种几何形状对设备的体系结构和功能提出了严格的限制。因此，越来越需要识别介电体，该介电体可保持基材支撑的几何形状，同时又能保持悬浮样品达到的质量。六方氮化硼（h-BN）是具有吸引力的基材，因为它具有原子上光滑的表面，相对没有悬挂键和电荷陷阱。它还具有类似于石墨的晶格常数，并且具有大的光子声子模和大的带隙。在这里，我们报告通过使用机械转移工艺在单晶h-BN衬底上制造高质量的剥落的单层和双层石墨烯器件。 h-BN衬底上的石墨烯器件的迁移率和载流子非均质性比SiO 2 上的器件好近一个数量级。这些器件还显示出降低的粗糙度，固有掺杂和化学反应性。以受控方式组装晶体层状材料的能力允许在其他有希望的电介质上制造石墨烯器件，并实现更复杂的石墨烯异质结构。

title: Scalable templated growth of graphene nanoribbons on SiC
title_cn: SiC上石墨烯纳米带的可扩展模板化生长
abstract: In spite of its excellent electronic properties, the use of graphene in field-effect transistors is not practical at room temperature without modification of its intrinsically semimetallic nature to introduce a bandgap. Quantum confinement effects can create a bandgap in graphene nanoribbons, but existing nanoribbon fabrication methods are slow and often produce disordered edges that compromise electronic properties. Here, we demonstrate the self-organized growth of graphene nanoribbons on a templated silicon carbide substrate prepared using scalable photolithography and microelectronics processing. Direct nanoribbon growth avoids the need for damaging post-processing. Raman spectroscopy, high-resolution transmission electron microscopy and electrostatic force microscopy confirm that nanoribbons as narrow as 40 nm can be grown at specified positions on the substrate. Our prototype graphene devices exhibit quantum confinement at low temperatures (4 K), and an on–off ratio of 10 and carrier mobilities up to 2,700 cm2 V−1 s−1 at room temperature. We demonstrate the scalability of this approach by fabricating 10,000 top-gated graphene transistors on a 0.24‐cm2 SiC chip, which is the largest density of graphene devices reported to date.
abstract_cn: 尽管石墨烯具有出色的电子性能，但如果不对其本质上的半金属性质进行修饰以引入带隙，则在室温下在场效应晶体管中使用石墨烯是不切实际的。量子限制效应会在石墨烯纳米带中产生带隙，但是现有的纳米带制造方法很慢，并且通常会产生影响电子性能的无序边缘。在这里，我们演示了使用可扩展光刻和微电子工艺制备的模板化碳化硅衬底上石墨烯纳米带的自组织生长。直接纳米带生长避免了破坏后处理的需要。拉曼光谱，高分辨率透射电子显微镜和静电力显微镜证实，窄至40纳米的纳米带可以在基板上的指定位置生长。我们的原型石墨烯器件在低温（4＆＃160; K）下表现出量子限制，开/关比为10，载流子迁移率高达2,700＆＃160; cm 2 ＆＃160 ; V ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 在室温下。我们通过在0.24＆＃8208; cm 2 SiC芯片上制造10,000个顶部栅极石墨烯晶体管来证明这种方法的可扩展性，这是迄今为止报道的最大密度的石墨烯器件。

title: Optical rectification and field enhancement in a plasmonic nanogap
title_cn: 等离子体纳米间隙中的光整流和场增强
abstract: Metal nanostructures act as powerful optical antennas because collective modes of the electron fluid in the metal are excited when light strikes the surface of the nanostructure. These excitations, known as plasmons, can have evanescent electromagnetic fields that are orders of magnitude larger than the incident electromagnetic field. The largest field enhancements often occur in nanogaps between plasmonically active nanostructures, but it is extremely challenging to measure the fields in such gaps directly. These enhanced fields have applications in surface-enhanced spectroscopies, nonlinear optics and nanophotonics. Here we show that nonlinear tunnelling conduction between gold electrodes separated by a subnanometre gap leads to optical rectification, producing a d.c. photocurrent when the gap is illuminated. Comparing this photocurrent with low-frequency conduction measurements, we determine the optical frequency voltage across the tunnelling region of the nanogap, and also the enhancement of the electric field in the tunnelling region, as a function of gap size. The measured field enhancements exceed 1,000, consistent with estimates from surface-enhanced Raman measurements. Our results highlight the need for more realistic theoretical approaches that are able to model the electromagnetic response of metal nanostructures on scales ranging from the free-space wavelength, λ, down to ∼λ/1,000, and for experiments with new materials, different wavelengths and different incident polarizations.
abstract_cn: 金属纳米结构可充当强大的光学天线，因为当光入射到纳米结构的表面时，金属中电子流体的集体模式会被激发。这些被称为等离激元的激发可以具有比入射电磁场大几个数量级的e逝电磁场。最大的场增强通常发生在等离激元活性纳米结构之间的纳米间隙中，但是直接测量此类间隙中的场极具挑战性。这些增强的领域可应用于表面增强光谱学，非线性光学和纳米光子学。在这里，我们显示了由亚纳米级间隙分隔的金电极之间的非线性隧穿传导会导致光整流，从而产生直流电。间隙被照亮时产生光电流。将该光电流与低频传导测量值进行比较，我们确定了纳米间隙的隧穿区域上的光频率电压，以及作为间隙尺寸的函数的隧穿区域中电场的增强。测得的场增强超过1,000，与表面增强拉曼测量的估计值一致。我们的研究结果凸显了对更现实的理论方法的需求，该方法能够对金属纳米结构的电磁响应进行建模，范围从自由空间波长（＆＃955;）到＆＃8764;＆＃955; / 1,000，用于使用新材料，不同波长和不同入射偏振的实验。</ p>

title: Direct observation of single-charge-detection capability of nanowire field-effect transistors
title_cn: 直接观察纳米线场效应晶体管的单电荷检测能力
abstract: A single localized charge can quench the luminescence of a semiconductor nanowire, but relatively little is known about the effect of single charges on the conductance of the nanowire. In one-dimensional nanostructures embedded in a material with a low dielectric permittivity, the Coulomb interaction and excitonic binding energy are much larger than the corresponding values when embedded in a material with the same dielectric permittivity. The stronger Coulomb interaction is also predicted to limit the carrier mobility in nanowires. Here, we experimentally isolate and study the effect of individual localized electrons on carrier transport in InAs nanowire field-effect transistors, and extract the equivalent charge sensitivity. In the low carrier density regime, the electrostatic potential produced by one electron can create an insulating weak link in an otherwise conducting nanowire field-effect transistor, modulating its conductance by as much as 4,200% at 31 K. The equivalent charge sensitivity, 4 × 10−5 e Hz−1/2 at 25 K and 6 × 10−5 e Hz−1/2 at 198 K, is orders of magnitude better than conventional field-effect transistors and nanoelectromechanical systems, and is just a factor of 20–30 away from the record sensitivity for state-of-the-art single-electron transistors operating below 4 K (ref. ). This work demonstrates the feasibility of nanowire-based single-electron memories and illustrates a physical process of potential relevance for high performance chemical sensors. The charge-state-detection capability we demonstrate also makes the nanowire field-effect transistor a promising host system for impurities (which may be introduced intentionally or unintentionally) with potentially long spin lifetimes, because such transistors offer more sensitive spin-to-charge conversion readout than schemes based on conventional field-effect transistors.
abstract_cn: 单个局部电荷可以淬灭半导体纳米线的发光，但是关于单个电荷对纳米线电导的影响的了解相对较少。在嵌入具有低介电常数的材料中的一维纳米结构中，当嵌入具有相同介电常数的材料中时，库仑相互作用和激子结合能远大于相应值。还预计更强的库仑相互作用会限制纳米线中的载流子迁移率。在这里，我们通过实验分离并研究了单个局部电子对InAs纳米线场效应晶体管中载流子传输的影响，并提取了等效的电荷灵敏度。在低载流子密度状态下，一个电子产生的静电势能在其他情况下导电的纳米线场效应晶体管中形成绝缘弱连接，从而在31K时将其电导率调节高达4,200％。等效电荷灵敏度4＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 <sup>＆＃8722; 5 </ sup>＆＃160; e＆＃160; Hz <sup>＆＃8722; 1/2 < / sup>在25＆＃160;＆6＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 <sup>＆＃8722; 5 </ sup>＆＃160; e＆＃160; Hz <sup>＆＃8722 ; 1/2 </ sup>在198＆＃160; K处比传统的场效应晶体管和纳米机电系统好几个数量级，并且距离状态的记录灵敏度仅相差20＆＃8211; 30在4K以下工作的最先进的单电子晶体管（ref。＆＃160;）。这项工作证明了基于纳米线的单电子存储器的可行性，并说明了与高性能化学传感器潜在相关的物理过程。我们展示的电荷状态检测能力还使纳米线场效应晶体管成为潜在的具有长自旋寿命的杂质（可能有意或无意引入）的有希望的宿主系统，因为此类晶体管提供了更灵敏的自旋至电荷转换读出比基于常规场效应晶体管的方案。</ p>

title: Direct nanoprinting by liquid-bridge-mediated nanotransfer moulding
title_cn: 通过液桥介导的纳米转移成型直接进行纳米印刷
abstract: Several techniques for the direct printing of functional materials have been developed to fabricate micro- and nanoscale structures and devices. We report a new direct patterning method, liquid-bridge-mediated nanotransfer moulding, for the formation of two- or three-dimensional structures with feature sizes as small as tens of nanometres over large areas up to 4 inches across. Liquid-bridge-mediated nanotransfer moulding is based on the direct transfer of various materials from a mould to a substrate through a liquid bridge between them. We demonstrate its usefulness by fabricating nanowire field-effect transistors and arrays of pentacene thin-film transistors.
abstract_cn: 已经开发了几种直接印刷功能材料的技术来制造微米和纳米级的结构和装置。 我们报告了一种新的直接构图方法，即液桥介导的纳米转移模制，用于形成二维或三维结构，其特征尺寸小至数十纳米，覆盖面积最大为4英寸。 液桥介导的纳米转移成型是基于各种材料通过它们之间的液桥从模具直接转移到基材上的。 我们通过制造纳米线场效应晶体管和并五苯薄膜晶体管阵列来证明其有用性。

title: Nanoscale mapping of ion diffusion in a lithium-ion battery cathode
title_cn: 锂离子电池阴极中离子扩散的纳米级映射
abstract: The movement of lithium ions into and out of electrodes is central to the operation of lithium-ion batteries. Although this process has been extensively studied at the device level, it remains insufficiently characterized at the nanoscale level of grain clusters, single grains and defects. Here, we probe the spatial variation of lithium-ion diffusion times in the battery-cathode material LiCoO2 at a resolution of ∼100 nm by using an atomic force microscope to both redistribute lithium ions and measure the resulting cathode deformation. The relationship between diffusion and single grains and grain boundaries is observed, revealing that the diffusion coefficient increases for certain grain orientations and single-grain boundaries. This knowledge provides feedback to improve understanding of the nanoscale mechanisms underpinning lithium-ion battery operation.
abstract_cn: 锂离子进出电极的运动对于锂离子电池的运行至关重要。 尽管已经在设备级别对这一过程进行了广泛的研究，但在纳米级的晶粒团簇，单个晶粒和缺陷方面仍缺乏足够的表征。 在这里，我们通过使用原子力显微镜重新分布锂离子和 测量所得的阴极变形。 观察到扩散与单晶和晶界之间的关系，表明扩散系数对于某些晶粒取向和单晶界增加。 这些知识可提供反馈，以增进对锂离子电池运行基础纳米机制的理解。
